name: hawthorn leaf pendant
description:
£60

a real hawthorn leaf, picked, pressed and imprinted into 100% sterling silver and suspended from a 16" silver snake chain. 18" chain available on request. Simple, elegant and tactile

the original leaf was picked from a hedgerow growing along side an ancient English water meadow. A reminder of our rural history and peaceful places

Set with 4mm aquamarines

name: hawthorn leaf earring with tendril earwire
description:
£75

a hawthorn leaf has been picked from an English fieldmargin, pressed, and imprinted onto 100% recycled sterling silver using a jeweller's rolling mill. The resulting earring is tactile and elegant and features a handmade and unique tendril-like earwire.

the original leaf was picked from a hedgerow growing along side an ancient English water meadow. A reminder of our rural history and peaceful places

Measurement: leaf is approx 2cm long and 1.5cm wide.

name: hawthorn leaf earring
description:

hawthorn leaf has been picked from an English fieldmargin, pressed, and imprinted onto 100% recycled sterling silver using a jeweller's rolling mill. The resulting earring is tactile and elegant

the original leaf was picked from a hedgerow growing along side an ancient English water meadow. A reminder of our rural history and peaceful places

Measurement: leaf is approx 2cm long and 1.5cm wide.

name: hornbeam twig earrings
description:
£60

delicate silver stud earrings featuring a tiny hornbeam twig

the twig was taken from a hornbeam tree in my garden, facing open fields, the exact spot i hang a hammock in the summer

for when you want more nature in your life

approx 5cm long

name: field maple pendant on long length silver chain
description:
£90

a beautiful field maple leaf rendered in sterling silver, suspended from a long, very sparkly silver chain (90cm total chain length)

the original leaf was picked from a small English woodland full of native species ... a reminder of woodland walks and the sense of wonder and connection they always seem to offer....

name: coastal shell earrings
description:
£75

striking drop earrings featuring a shell from Brancaster beach, north Norfolk, cast in 100% recycled sterling silver - full of texture and detail from its tumbling in the North Sea

... remember how it feels to walk along a favourite beach with the sun on your back, or gaze out to sea on a bright, winter's day? this was made to capture those moments in precious metal, a reminder of the  feelings they evoke...

name: silver shell earrings
description:
£70

a sea-tumbled shell found on a beach in north norfolk and cast into sterling silver. 

suspended from solid silver ear wires

shell measures approx 2cm

name: seashell pendant with semi precious stones
description:
£75

gorgeous silver seashell, full of the tactile surface details of a real shell, sea tumbled in the sea on the north norfolk coastline, embellished with semi precious stones - aquamarine, iolite and moonstone

shell is approx 2cm long including bail

name: coastal pebble earrings
description:
£70

sterling silver pebbles, full of texture and detail, cast from a real pebble found whilst beach combing on Brancaster beach, north Norfolk

...wear to celebrate the memories of beach combing, sand falling through the fingers, moments to cherish...

measurements: wire 5cm long, pebble 12mm

name: coastal pebble ring
description:
£75

a strong, simple ring, featuring a deliciously tactile silver pebble, cast in silver, from an actual sea-tossed pebble found on a beach in north norfolk.

measurements: pebble 1.5cm x 1cm,  ring sizes m - p

*PLEASE INDICATE VIA EMAIL WHETHER YOU WISH PEBBLE SET HORIZONTALLY OR VERTICALLY* Thank you.

name: silver dewdrop stud
description:
£35

Solid silver studs, rounded and tactile (1cm), and available in a high polish or brushed finish. These were originally hand carved in wax and then cast.

evokes early morning walks in a garden or along a river bank, dew still heavy on the plants...
